summary: A single mother determined to make it as a singer puts together an all girl reggae group named Neeta, Sweeta, & Nastie with her friends. Living in a housing project with little support, the... See full summary Â»
cast: Anjela Lauren Smith|Wil Johnson|Caroline Chikezie|Jocelyn Jee Esien|Don Warrington|Tameka Empson|Diane Bailey|Vas Blackwood|Andrea Francis|Anton Rice|Saffron Lashley|Corinne Skinner-Carter|Suzette Llewellyn|Buckley Ranks|Bushman|Badi Uzzaman|Tippa Irie|Governor Tiggy|Pete Hunnigale|Barbara Lawrence|Stella Pilaya|Tanita|Dujhan Dennis Planter|Superflex|Bubbler Ranx|Richie Dan|General Levy|Lorna G.|Cabio|Dennis Victory
title: Babymother
